mapper.select: select employee_id,emp_name,email,phone_number,hire_date,salary from employees order by employee_id

select b.department_id as de_id,b.department_name as de_name, a.department_name as upde_na,c.emp_name as manager_name from departments a, departments b, employees c where a.department_id(+)=b.parent_id and b.manager_id=c.employee_id(+) order by de_id
select a.RoomCode as roomcode,a.name as name,b.name as type,a.howmany as howmany,a.howmuch as howmuch from room a,roomtype b where a.type=b.typecode
select typecode,name from roomtype order by typecode
mapper.update: update menu set name=#{param2},price=#{param3} where code=#{param1}
update room set name=#{param2}, type=#{param3}, howmany=#{param4}, howmuch=#{param5} where roomcode=#{param1}
